Subject: Re: To the CR Chambers
From: Iron Raptor <ironraptor13@...>


* Iron Raptor simply walked into the CR chamber room with Prowl, completely content in following him anywhere.
Looking towards him as he looked back at her, a smile crossing her face.
Following him in his embrace towards a chamber, simply looking it over as they stop before it.
She smiled up at Prowl as he leaned close and accepted his lips as they locked onto her own, stepping even closer and wrapping her arms around his neck. She closed her optics as the kiss continued, feeling Prowl embrace her fully and loving every moment of it.
Iron Raptor looked lovingly at Prowl as he leaned back, keeping his arms around her.
She stroked his neck as she heard him speak, nodding shortly.
With a reluctant sigh she moved back a bit in order to free herself from his embrace, yet found that she couldn't.
He was holding her too tightly.
Iron Raptor chuckled and looked up at him, the same love in her optics that had always been there for him.*

" I would repair...if you could stand to let go of me for a moment?"
